fullText:
Pious Champion

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, paladin, call of virtue or lay on hands power
Benefit: When you use your call of virtue or lay on hands, you can target one or two creatures. If you target two creatures with lay on hands, you spend one healing surge and each target regains hit points as normal for the power.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 142.
